NGO_Hero_Section.title: Be the Bridge Between Hope and Healing
NGO_Hero_Section.description: Join a network of change-makers repurposing medicines to bring health and hope to underserved communities.

cardData.description: We aim to bridge the gap between surplus medicines and underserved communities, empowering NGOs to make a tangible impact on healthcare access.
We aim to bridge the gap between surplus medicines and underserved communities, empowering NGOs to make a tangible impact on healthcare access.

flipCardData.flip_content_description: Contribute unused medicines to help those who need them the most.

Be a part of our mission to ensure no medicine goes unused.

Swiping-images.title: Medicine Redistribution
Swiping-images.description: Donate unused medicines for better health and less waste.

Swiping-images.title: Empowering NGOs
Swiping-images.description: Join us to deliver unused medicines to those in need. Together, we save lives and reduce waste.

Swiping-images.title: Community Outreach
Swiping-images.description: Spread awareness about medicine donation to create a collective impact.

PartnerCard.title: Expand Your Reach
PartnerCard.description: Gain access to surplus medicines to extend your NGO's reach and make a significant impact in underserved areas.

PartnerCard.title: Build Strategic Partnerships
PartnerCard.description: Collaborate with donors and other NGOs to amplify the reach and efficiency of your healthcare initiatives.

PartnerCard.title: Drive Sustainable Change
PartnerCard.description: Play a pivotal role in reducing waste and ensuring essential medicines are delivered to those who need them most.

PartnerCard2.name: Prayas Health Group
PartnerCard2.description: Providing medical support and health camps to underserved communities in Ahmedabad.

PartnerCard2.name: Sankalp Charitable Trust
PartnerCard2.description: Focused on healthcare, education, and rural development, bringing medical aid to marginalized communities.

PartnerCard2.name: Shri Jalaram Arogya Seva Trust
PartnerCard2.description: Providing healthcare services, including medical camps, for underprivileged communities in Ahmedabad.

heading.herotitle: Stop Medication Waste. Support the Poor People
heading.heropara: Every year, countless people, including needy people, struggle to afford life-saving medicines, while unused and unopened medications go to waste. Together, we can change that. Help us repurpose these medicines to bring hope and health to those in need.

BlogTitle.Blogdescription: Explore stories of impact, learn how unused medicine donations change lives,\nand stay updated with the latest insights on community health initiatives.
